summary: Comprehensive testing of new Zoho Books extended features completed. Backend: 16/16 tests passed (100%) for all new APIs. Frontend: All 7 new pages working correctly with proper navigation links in sidebar.

tests: New Delivery Challan button opens create dialog
Create dialog has Customer dropdown, Challan Type, Reference Number, Add Items section
New Project button opens create dialog
Create dialog has Project Name, Customer, Description, Billing Type, Hourly Rate, Budget Hours
New Recurring Invoice button opens create dialog
Tabs for Individual Taxes and Tax Groups
New Tax button opens create dialog
Create dialog has Tax Name, Tax Percentage, Tax Type, Set as default toggle, Description
Tabs for All, Assets, Liabilities, Equity, Income, Expense
Accounts grouped by type with badges
New Account button opens create dialog
Journal entries list with dates, references, amounts
New Journal Entry button opens create dialog
Create dialog has Reference Number, Notes, Add Entry Line (Account, Debit, Credit)
Vendor credits list with vendor names, dates, reasons, amounts
New Vendor Credit button opens create dialog
Chart of Accounts link in sidebar -> /chart-of-accounts

critical_code_review_comments: All new pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
All create dialogs have proper form validation
Backend APIs follow consistent response format with code: 0 for success
Navigation links properly integrated in sidebar under appropriate sections
seed_data_creation: Test data created with TEST_ prefix during backend tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 7 new Zoho Books extended features fully tested: Delivery Challans, Projects, Recurring Transactions, Taxes, Chart of Accounts, Journal Entries, Vendor Credits. All pages load correctly with proper data-testid attributes. All create dialogs open and have proper form fields. All backend APIs working (16/16 tests passed). Navigation links present in sidebar.
